lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Heeeey chief...

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: So… do you know Paisley?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: This absolute worrywart has been keeping tabs on me this whole time!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I… am not exactly sure how to feel about this…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But at least I’m glad it all turned out for the better!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: The party was about to be a total disaster, until she came along and turned things around.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I’m gonna tell you all about it, but first - I’m parched. Could you make me something herbaceous and mild?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: No, chief, don’t be disappointing me now!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: That’s not going to cut it! I want you to make me a tea that is herbaceous and mild! I know you have this stuff somewhere in here!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Thank you so much. This one tastes so amazing. You’re literally saving my life right now, hehe~

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: This is the good stuff, I tell you. My taste buds have been crying for this one.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: So now you must be wondering how the party went.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I’m just going to say, I heavily overestimated my ability to just mingle with people I haven’t met before.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: All that I managed to do was to introduce myself, say hi to everyone, and then I was just a wallflower.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I must have been so out of place, they have been staring at me so much!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But I also couldn’t leave, because it’s been literally ten minutes into the party!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But then I saw Paisley, and I’ve been like 'What are you doing here?' and she was like 'I’m not going to let you have a bad time at this party'

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Then I was like 'What you gonna do, drag me out of this place?' And she was like 'No, I’m gonna drag you into the dance floor and you’re gonna love it.'

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: And, chief, she did not disappoint. It was amazing. I didn't know she had it in her.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Then, she let me hang out with her friends there, and then - you’re not gonna believe it…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: She just said 'Have a good time, pookie. Call me if you need me.' and left! Let me hang out with people completely on my own!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But by that time I was already in a little clique out there, and had tons of fun.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: And also yeah, me and Paisley made up.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I was a bit too harsh on her. I shouldn’t have pushed her away like that simply because she’s not supporting me the exact way that I want.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: All that we had to do was to talk out our differences.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: It appears that communication is very important! Who would have known?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: So yeah, that’s how the party went. Thanks for listening!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: And thanks for the tea, too! I will be heading home now, so much has happened today. See you!
